title: We were intrigued by the recent meta-analysis by Pilling et al. (2002) of results from randomized, controlled trials of the effects of cognitive remediation on neurocognitive deficits in patients with schizophrenia
abstract: We were intrigued by the recent meta-analysis by Pilling et al. (2002) of results from randomized, controlled trials of the effects of cognitive remediation on neurocognitive deficits in patients with schizophrenia - Volume 34 Issue 3
